page.title: 07HELSTON BOATING LAKE
page.content: Helston Boating Lake is situated on Lower Green which is on the outskirts of Helston. There are three actual islands on the Boating Lake. The biggest island is the main breeding home for the ducks, geese and swans. The play area consists of swings, a slide and a climbing frame. It is in frequent use every day by people passing through to get to the Boating Lake or to actually play in the area For peoples use there is a putting green and two tennis courts. The Boating Lake has a shop which sells drinks, ice cream and hamburgers. The River Cober passes by the Boating Lake and drives an old Water Wheel. The real name of the Boating Lake is Coronation Park.
